H0.text: Which historically contested region did Russia annexe from Ukraine in February 2014. Donetsk

H1.text: Which historically contested region did Russia annexe from Ukraine in February 2014. Luhansk

H2.text: Which historically contested region did Russia annexe from Ukraine in February 2014. Transnistria

H3.text: Which historically contested region did Russia annexe from Ukraine in February 2014. Крим

A4.text: On 27 February, Russian forces occupied parliament and government buildings and other strategic points in Crimea and the Russian‑organised Republic of Crimea declared independence from Ukraine following an illegal and internationally unrecognised referendum.

A5.text: In 2014, the peninsula was occupied by Russian forces and annexed by Russia.
